chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.simpara: Initially generated by using generator-jvm yeoman generator (kotlin-parent-multi-project)

para.programlisting:
# maven jar ./mvnw clean package java -jar target/*-all.jar
# maven docker / docker-compose ./mvnw docker-compose:up -P docker ./mvnw docker-compose:down -P docker
# gradle jar ./gradlew java -jar ./build/libs/*-all.jar
# gradle install script ./gradlew clean installDist ./build/install/first-blood/bin/first-blood
# gradle distribution ./gradlew clean distZip unzip -o ./build/distributions/first-blood-0.0.1.zip -d /tmp bash /tmp/first-blood-0.0.1/bin/first-blood
# gradle docker / docker-compose ./gradlew clean build composeUp ./gradlew composeDown
